rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 07G, 07PG} owned by {50000567}
For COURSE_CODE IN {3387, L6005} Do Must have passed 72 credit points Otherwise true

description: This unit examines Australia's superannuation regime. It covers superannuation policy, regulation, taxation and practice. The unit focuses on the way in which superannuation funds are regulated under the Superannuation Industry Supervision Act and how superannuation contributions, benefits and investments are taxed. It also considers tax planning and other strategies for members of superannuation funds.
